'''Event Domains''' are [[Domains]] that are available during a Limited Time [[Events]]. Some event domains are accessible in the overworld, identifiable by its unique doorway entrance. Other event domains are accessible via the event menu. All "[[Test Run - Character Trial Event|Test Run]]" domains are event domains.
